我非常喜欢CSGO这款游戏，因为它有着非常强的竞技性而且非常公平，但是游戏环境实在是非常糟糕，经常在官方匹配中遇到开挂的玩家，其中有跟我一样来自中国的玩家也有各个国家的玩家，我希望官方能加大对外挂的封禁处理 希望可以做到封禁IP，或者恢复游戏售价的方式，现在免费进行游玩大大降低了开挂的成本，所以希望官方重视一下对外挂的处理方法。
I like it very much CSGO this game, because he has a very strong competitive and very fair, but the game environment is very bad, often encountered in the official match hang players, there are players from China as well as I do also have players from all countries, I hope to increase foreign official hang banned processing hope can be banned IP, or restore price game, now free to play greatly cut the cost of open hanging, so hope that the official to the external processing method of hanging.

Fantastic all round.

ive managed to play 256h and not get bored so

Anyway they did an event recently for the first time in 2 yrs. nice to know after all this time csgo is still getting love from the developers at Valve. 

There are hackers but it seems that prime manages to remove 99% of them making the play experience great. Also if your team is good enough no hacks are going to stop a 1v5.

There are loads of people from many different countries so there is a nice variety of people to talk to and join up with.

At the start of the game its difficult to stay alive for very long as people are extremely good sometimes. Also you may get kicked because they would rather have a bot.

All in all its a very good game once you've got to know the controls and the spots.
I would definitely recommend this to anyone!! :)
